title: TNA Leader Sampanthan meets President Rajapaksa
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Sudath Silva – A special discussion between President Mahinda Rajapaksa and Tamil National Alliance (TNA) Leader R. Sampanthan was held at President’s House today on 04 October. The meeting between the two leaders took place this morning at 8.30 am and the pair last met in July this…
